TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted!...nuclear fusion no longer physically exists in any form anywhere in the universe. Please, apologize to our life-giving Sun, he's all ears.

I wish I could breathe underwater.

Granted. You can only breathe underwater, isolating you from the rest of humanity.

I wish the new iPhones had more new features that weren't on Android phones two years ago.

Granted!...they now have more new features that were on Android phones three years ago.

I wish Santa Claus were a chocolate Cthulhu.

Sorry i can't grant that, the Easter Bunny would be upset.

I wish that my pc could launch a 4000 part rocket.

Granted - your PC is taken away from you by NASA, using it to handle the flight programming of a space rocket consisting of 4000 parts.

I wish I was burned alive, and that it was painful. >:-]

It's just as painful as normally being burned alive, except that you don't actually burn. You just feel like you're burning, forever.

I wish you would turn the flame in your avatar back on!

Nope.

I wish for this wish to not be a wish but also be a wish while not being a wish.

Nope.

(See how that's a cop out? )

I wish for 3D "fishtank" style computer displays to be developed and made affordable.

They are, but they only have 15 layers and resolutions comparable to flip phones from the 2000s. Could be useful for making tiny gifs in GIMP/Photoshop, though!

I wish for more exclamation points, because I ran out after putting one in that last sentence.

Granted, but it's not the ! symbol. You literally exclaim, "POINT".

I wish the entire world would do the Macarena every day at the same time.

Granted, but they thought you said "macaroni", so it's Mac'n'Cheese for everyone at dinnertime, forever.

I wish I had a motorcycle.

Yes, your brand-new motorcycle is unique in every way! Mostly because it's made out of your disassembled body parts and ridden by your soul.

I wish I could plant chocolate flowers.

Granted.

I wish to have a pilot's license.

Edit: Ninja'd but the ninja forgot to make a wish.

Edit: Dammit, he ninja'd my edit!

Granted, but you planted them in Death Valley and they didn't last very long.

I'd like a gin and tonic.

EDIT: ninja'd

You get the license, but it's only for paper airplanes.

I repeat my request for a gin and tonic.

Granted, but it expires in one minute.

I wish for a S-II.

Edit: MONSTER NINJA

Granted. Your S-two is hunted down by a monster ninja.

I wish for a bigger bag of potatoes.

Granted....but it's now sticking out the roof of your house, and the black helicopters are circling overhead.

I wish for no more ninja's.

EDIT: OK, I give up!

Granted, but now we all get Samuri'd.

I wish for

You get

, but it is no longer viable.

I want ice cubes.

Finally, a wish that isn't corrupted and/or ninja'd.

.

I wish Death Note were real.

Granted. It's inside the moon.

I wish that there was a car that I could ride into an extremely hazardous area.

Granted, but your drivers license is outdated.

I wish for a

The car, like the motorcycle above, is made out of the wisher's body parts and ridden by the wisher's soul.

I wish the moon were inside me.

I also wish this goddamn ninja would stop it already.

You become the universe, which contains the moon. Then, suddenly...

Granted, but it's not the ! symbol. You literally exclaim, "POINT".

Aw, what? No fairPOINT

I wish I could make better gifs.

Edited September 10, 2014 by GreeningGalaxy

Granted. GIF's are now the most hated internet item and attract enormous amounts of trolls.

I wish for a troll that does my bidding.
